Classes in me.normanmaurer.niosmtp used by me.normanmaurer.niosmtp
DeliveryRecipientStatus
          Status for the delivery of an email to a recipient
DeliveryRecipientStatus.Status
           
DeliveryResult
          Result of an email delivery
SMTPClientConfig
          Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
SMTPClientFuture
          A Future which allows to register SMTPClientFutureListener and also make it possible to access the DeliveryResult objects in a blocking fashion.
SMTPClientFutureListener
          A listener which will get informed once the SMTP delivery was done
SMTPCommand
          The different SMTP Commands
SMTPException
          Base Exception class for the SMTP Client
SMTPResponse
          The SMTP Response which is send back from the SMTP Server to the client
